benefits.page_title: Benefits of Being Part of Dicilo
benefits.page_subtitle: Discover why Dicilo is the ideal platform for both companies and users who value quality and trust.

size.title: We are small
size.description: This allows us to focus on every detail and provide personalized attention to each of our members.

experience.title: We are big
experience.description: We have over 25 years of experience in the world of networking and marketing, which ensures our success and reliability.

two_reasons.title: Two great reasons to choose us
two_reasons.description: We are the meeting point where quality products and demanding consumers come together.

item1.title: Targeted Visibility
item1.description: Connect with an audience that is genuinely interested in what you offer.

item2.title: Network Expansion
item2.description: Access a global network of entrepreneurs and potential customers.

item3.title: Brand Trust
item3.description: Strengthen your image through authentic recommendations from satisfied customers.

item1.title: Exclusive Offers
item1.description: Access unique discounts on local and international products.

item2.title: Reliable Recommendations
item2.description: Make informed decisions thanks to the reviews of a trusted community.

item3.title: Rewards for Your Participation
item3.description: Benefit from your interactions and become a key part of the network.

network.title: A Unique Network in Germany
network.description: Dicilo is not just a platform; it's a complete ecosystem designed to benefit both businesses and consumers.

for_companies.title: For Businesses
for_companies.description: Dicilo is a showcase for your products and a strategic partner to help you grow. We give you the tools to reach a wider and more engaged audience.

for_users.title: For Users
for_users.description: Being part of Dicilo not only gives you access to exclusive offers, but also makes you part of a community where your opinion matters and is rewarded.

network.cta_text: Are you ready to be part of the change?

social.title: Follow us on our networks
social.description: Don't miss any of our news and special promotions. Join our digital community on your favorite platform.

pricing_page.hero_subtitle: Welcome to DICILO, the recommendation portal you can trust. Find the plan that best suits you.
pricing_page.plans_desc_1: At DICILO, we are convinced that success is achieved through genuine recommendations and a strong community.
pricing_page.plans_desc_2: That is why we have developed a platform that connects companies and buyers efficiently.
pricing_page.plans_desc_3: Whether you want to sell, buy, or donate items you no longer use, DICILO offers you a cost-effective and impactful solution.
pricing_page.plans_cta: Choose the right plan for you now and contact us!
